Package.Name: IPX800
Package.Author: Sebastien Warin
Package.Description: Connect your GCE Electronics IPX800 v4 to Constellation

Setting.name: Host
Setting.description: The hostname (IP or DNS) of your IPX800v4 device

Setting.name: HttpPort
Setting.description: The HTTP port of your IPX800v4 device

Setting.name: ApiKey
Setting.description: The API key (leave blank if not use)

Setting.name: UseLabelAsStateObjectName
Setting.description: Use the label (eg. label defined in ElementsConfigurations's setting) to name the StateObject or the IPX identifier

Setting.name: PollElementTypes
Setting.description: The list (separated by comma) of element's types to poll (eg. XTHL, A, VA, XPWM, etc...). For more information read the README

Setting.name: ElementsConfigurations
Setting.description: The list of known elements of your IPX to customize the label, room location and other options. Use https://goo.gl/Zc8hmx to generate this setting et read the README for more information

Setting.name: IgnoreUnknownElement
Setting.description: Ignore all IPX elements that are not referenced in the ElementsConfigurations's setting
